name: Simple Tabs
body:
# jQuery SimpleTabs Plugin # When you need tabs and don't want to fight the complexities of an overbuilt plugin. This plugin is designed to be as simple as possible. Just follow this simple markup structure and it'll just work. Comes in under 1k minified. ```html
  • tab1
  • tab2
  • tab3
Tab 1 Contents -- Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
Tab 2 Contents -- Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
Tab 2 Contents -- Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
``` Options include: ```javascript var defaults = { tabItemsSelector: ".tab-items > li", // tab items tabPanesSelector: ".tab-pane", // tab panes cssClassOn: "active" // css class denoting active state of current tab }; ``` Invocation Examples: ```javascript $('.simple-tabs').simpleTabs(); $('.other-simple-tabs').simpleTabs({ ccsClassOn: "current" }); ``` __Win__ View demo http://rsturim.github.com/simple-tabs/examples/
